title: Caleb the Cross-Eyed Cowboy: Criminal Demon-slayer Extraordinaire
description: Caleb is an obsessive compulsive cross-eyed cowboy, hell-bent on robbing the Hicksville bank. The residents of that small country town mistake him for a demon-slayer and nominate him to rid their community of its recent demon infestation. Caleb plays the part for all itâ€™s worth, whilst secretly plotting to rob the town blind. Meanwhile, the demons plan their resistance.
author: Chris Hinkle
